text: Nao aathani a Afilisti16:5 Bũrũri wa Afilisti warĩ wa ngwatanĩro ya matũũra matano, namo matũũra macio maathagwo nĩ aathani atano. magĩthiĩ kũrĩ we, makĩmwĩra atĩrĩ, “Rora kana wahota kũmũheenereria, akwĩre hitho ya hinya ũcio wake mũnene, na ũrĩa tũngĩmũkĩria hinya nĩguo tũmuohe, tũmũtoorie. O ũmwe witũ nĩagakũhe cekeri ngiri ĩmwe na igana rĩmwe cia betha.16:5 nĩ ta kilo 13”
